channel.title: Safe Zones / PK Zones?
channel.description: How do I made a PK zone into a Safe Zone? My ::home area is a PK zone, which gets WAY out of hand. I need to know how to change it into a safe zone? PLEASE can someone help me?

item.description:

item.title: Safe Zones / PK Zones?
item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape
item.description:
@The_Prodigyscape wrote:

[quote=“xx Santa pker xX, post:3, topic:190128”]I will!

Ok first. When you make a safe zone…Its like coords to a box!

Then you do this…

Search for

public boolean nonWild() {

Then you see codes like this…

 (absX >= 2437 && absX <=2446  && absY >= 3082 && absY <=3098 ) || (absX >= 2805 && absX <=2878  && absY >= 3222 && absY <=3313 ) || (absX >= 3187 && absX <=3194  && absY >= 3958 && absY <=3962 ) || (absX >= 3187 && absX <=3194  && absY >= 3958 && absY <=3962 ) || (absX >= 3088 && absX <=3088  && absY >= 3524 && absY <=3527 ) || (absX >= 2745 && absX <=2745  && absY >= 3742 && absY <=3742 ) || (absX >= 3093 && absX <=3119  && absY >= 3921 && absY <=3947 ) || (absX >=2739  && absX <=2785 && absY >=3480  && absY <=3518 ) || (absX >=3527  && absX <=3583 && absY >=3264  && absY <=3327 ) || (absX >=2601  && absX <=2613 && absY >=3404  && absY <=3419 ) || (absX >=3183  && absX <=3191 && absY >=3417  && absY <=3429 ) || (absX >=2515  && absX <=2542 && absY >=3161  && absY <=3175 ) || (absX >=2528  && absX <=2548 && absY >=4709  && absY <=4723 ) || (absX >=2528  && absX <=3286 && absY >=2763  && absY <=2778 ) || (absX >=3189  && absX <=3214 && absY >=3254  && absY <=3278 )

Basicly you do this…(The BOTTOM LEFT HAND CORNER IS SOUTH AND THE TOP RIGHT HAND CORNER IS NORTH.)

 (absX >=(THE BOTTOM LEFT HAND CORNER X COORD)  && absX <=(THE TOP RIGHT HAND CORNER X COORD) && absY >=(THE BOTTOM LEFT HAND CORNER Y COORD && absY <=(THE TOP RIGHT HAND CORNER Y COORD)

Phew that took me a while to type but…Hope it helped…[/quote]
lawl that area in the pic is where the home of my server is.

Read full topic

item.title: Safe Zones / PK Zones?
item.dc:creator: @xx_Santa_pker_xX xx Santa pker xX
item.description:
@xx_Santa_pker_xX wrote:

I will!

Ok first. When you make a safe zone…Its like coords to a box!

Then you do this…

Search for

public boolean nonWild() {

Then you see codes like this…

 (absX >= 2437 && absX <=2446  && absY >= 3082 && absY <=3098 ) || (absX >= 2805 && absX <=2878  && absY >= 3222 && absY <=3313 ) || (absX >= 3187 && absX <=3194  && absY >= 3958 && absY <=3962 ) || (absX >= 3187 && absX <=3194  && absY >= 3958 && absY <=3962 ) || (absX >= 3088 && absX <=3088  && absY >= 3524 && absY <=3527 ) || (absX >= 2745 && absX <=2745  && absY >= 3742 && absY <=3742 ) || (absX >= 3093 && absX <=3119  && absY >= 3921 && absY <=3947 ) || (absX >=2739  && absX <=2785 && absY >=3480  && absY <=3518 ) || (absX >=3527  && absX <=3583 && absY >=3264  && absY <=3327 ) || (absX >=2601  && absX <=2613 && absY >=3404  && absY <=3419 ) || (absX >=3183  && absX <=3191 && absY >=3417  && absY <=3429 ) || (absX >=2515  && absX <=2542 && absY >=3161  && absY <=3175 ) || (absX >=2528  && absX <=2548 && absY >=4709  && absY <=4723 ) || (absX >=2528  && absX <=3286 && absY >=2763  && absY <=2778 ) || (absX >=3189  && absX <=3214 && absY >=3254  && absY <=3278 )

Basicly you do this…(The BOTTOM LEFT HAND CORNER IS SOUTH AND THE TOP RIGHT HAND CORNER IS NORTH.)

 (absX >=(THE BOTTOM LEFT HAND CORNER X COORD)  && absX <=(THE TOP RIGHT HAND CORNER X COORD) && absY >=(THE BOTTOM LEFT HAND CORNER Y COORD && absY <=(THE TOP RIGHT HAND CORNER Y COORD)

Phew that took me a while to type but…Hope it helped…

item.title: Safe Zones / PK Zones?
item.dc:creator: @deamerdude deamerdude
item.description:
@deamerdude wrote:

search “boolean nonwild” in your client.java then copy this || (absX >= 3229 && absX <= 3242 && absY >= 9796 && absY <= 9807) Go southwest of the area u want nonmember. put the coords in the first two abs slots. Then go northeast of area u want non wild. put coords in last two slots.
